questions.question: What academic qualifications does Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake hold?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake holds a B.Sc. and a Ph.D. from the University of Peradeniya.

questions.question: When did Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake start his research work at Peradeniya?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake started his Solid State Ionic research work at Peradeniya on 02.01.1986.

questions.question: Which universities were involved in Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's Ph.D. research?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's Ph.D. research involved Peradeniya and Chalmers University of Technology (CTH), Gothenburg, Sweden.

questions.question: Who were Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's supervisors during his Ph.D. research?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's Ph.D. research supervisors were Prof. MAKL Dissanayake, Prof. MA Careem from Peradeniya, and Prof. B.-E. Mellander from Chalmers University of Technology.

questions.question: When did Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake obtain his Ph.D.?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake obtained his Ph.D. in May 1991.

questions.question: Where did Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake work as a postdoctoral fellow?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake worked as a postdoctoral fellow at LIES, ENSEEG, Grenoble, France.

questions.question: What was Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's research focus at LIES, ENSEEG?
questions.answer: At LIES, ENSEEG, Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake worked on Glass with Prof. J.L. Souquet and Prof. M. Duclot, on polymers with Prof. Michel Armand, and on Graphite with Prof. R. Yazami.

questions.question: What role did Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake hold when he joined the Department of Physics?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake joined the Department of Physics as a Temporary Assistant Lecturer.

questions.question: For how long did Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake conduct research at Chalmers University of Technology?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake conducted research for 2 years and 6 months at Chalmers University of Technology.

questions.question: Which countries were involved in Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's research work?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's research work involved Sri Lanka, Sweden, and France.

questions.question: What specific types of materials did Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake research during his postdoctoral fellowship?
questions.answer: During his postdoctoral fellowship, Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake researched Glass, polymers, and Graphite.

questions.question: Which professors did Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake collaborate with on polymers during his postdoctoral research?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake collaborated with Prof. Michel Armand on polymers during his postdoctoral research.

questions.question: What was Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake's affiliation during his postdoctoral research?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake was affiliated with LIES, ENSEEG, Grenoble, France during his postdoctoral research.

questions.question: What positions has Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake held in his academic career?
questions.answer: Dr. P.W.S.K. Bandaranayake has held the position of Senior Lecturer Grade I at the Department of Physics.
